p: Lambs weighed an average of 21.26 kg (±S.D. 3.41 kg) at 8 weeks of age and ewes produced a total 8 week lamb weight of 35.13 kg (±S.D. 9.28 kg). Eight week lamb weight was not significantly correlated with maximum ewe FEC ( r s = −0.044, P = 0.756, r 2 = −0.002), mean ewe FEC ( r s = −0.132, P = 0.352, r 2 = −0.017), nor FEC EBV ( r s = −0.181, P = 0.197, r 2 = −0.033).
